title: Simplify Expression
description: Evaluate expressions, combine like terms, and apply the distributive property to simplify algebraic expressions.

questions.question: Evaluate $2(x + y) - z$ when $x=3, y=2, z=4$.
Combine like terms: $1/2 a + 1/3 b - 1/4 a + 1/6 b$.
Combine like terms: $1/2 x + 3/4 y - 1/4 x + 1/2 y$.
Combine like terms: $2/3 a - 1/2 b + 1/6 a + b$.
Evaluate $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$ when $x=1, y=2, z=3$.
Evaluate $F = G\frac{m_1 m_2}{r^2}$ when $G = 1, m_1 = 2, m_2 = 3, r = 1$.
Evaluate $A = P(1 + rt)$ when $P = 1000, r = 0.05, t = 2$.
Combine like terms: $1/3 x^2 - 1/2 x + 2/3 x^2 + 1/4 x - 1$.
Evaluate $S = 2(lw + lh + wh)$ when $l=2, w=3, h=4$.
Combine like terms: $1/2 xy + 1/3 x - 1/4 xy + 2/3 x$.
Evaluate $V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$ when $\pi \approx 3.14, r=3, h=5$.
Combine like terms: $1/5 a^2 - 2/5 a + 1/10 a^2 + 1/2 a$.
Evaluate $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$ when $x=-1, y=-2, z=-3$.
Evaluate $V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$ when $\pi \approx 3.14, r=2, h=6$.
Evaluate $(x + y + z)^2$ when $x=1, y=1, z=1$.
Evaluate $V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$ when $r=1, h=3$ (leave in terms of $\pi$).
Evaluate $x^2 + y^2 - z^2$ when $x=5, y=12, z=13$.
Evaluate $(a + b + c)^3$ when $a=1, b=0, c=0$.
Evaluate $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$ when $x=0, y=0, z=0$.
Evaluate $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$ when $x=1/2, y=1/2, z=1/2$.
